alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 6:28AM EST until December 21 at 4:13PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water up to Bachelder Road in Allenstown. Waterfront campsites impacted, campers should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 7.2 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 6.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
